results.name: Proyecto en Unity para el grado

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGL / VRAM 1GB or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
